edu.escuelaing.arep.networking.httpserver

Class HttpServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.escuelaing.arep.networking.httpserver.HttpServer

  • public class HttpServer
extends Object
    Web Server implementation, recieve HTTP requests and reponse HTML, JS, CSS and images resources In addition this class has a simple implementation of a spring framework
    Version:
    4.0 (14/09/21)
    Author:
    Angie Medina
